SixesWildGame.model

Class Lightning

  • java.lang.Object
    • SixesWildGame.model.Level
      • SixesWildGame.model.Lightning
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Lightning
extends Level
    Creates a Lightning Level.
    Author:
    Liz Miller & npmahowald
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decreaseMovesLeft()
      decreaseMovesLeft() overrides the method to do nothing as the lightning game type doesn't use moves
      boolean endGame()
      endGame() designates to end the lightning level type when the timer runs out
      int getMovesLeft()
      getMovesLeft() overrides the number of moves left in a lightning level to 0
      int getTime()
      getTime() is a getter for the time
      java.lang.String getType()
      getType(Level l) is a getter which returns the type of the level.
      void setTime(int t)
      setTime() is a setter for the time

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lightning

        public Lightning(int time,
         int[] starThreshold,
         int[] tileWeight,
         int[] multWeight,
         int eliminateTilesLeft,
         int swapTilesLeft,
         int lvlNum)
        Constructor for Lightning which creates a new Lightning level by taking in the appropriate values
        Parameters:
        time - The amount of time remaining listed as the initial amount of time in the constructor
        starThreshold - The threshold values for one, two or three stars
        tileWeight - The percentages for the chance of tiles having a certain value listed as a series of numbers
        multWeight - The percentages for the chance of tiles having a certain multiplier listed as a series of numbers
        eliminateTilesLeft - The number of eliminate tiles special moves remaining
        swapTilesLeft - The number of swap tiles special moves remaining
        lvlNum - The number of the level being worked on
